title: Smyrna
headline:
Your best health,
here in Smyrna
intro: If you don’t already have a Primary Care Provider, it’s important to make an appointment and find an expert you trust to guide your health and refer you to specialty care if needed.

locationsIntro.title: Smyrna
locationsIntro.content: ChristianaCare Primary Care locations offer a variety comprehensive medical care for adults and children, with a convenient practice for our neighbors in the Smyrna area. Many locations offer appointments by video, by phone or in-office. Call for details.

locations.title: ChristianaCare Primary Care at Smyrna
locations.details: 100 S. Main St., Suite 207, Smyrna, DE 19977
